data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Gekko Laurenti (Squamata: Sauria: Gekkonidae) from Vietnam with remarks on G. japonicus (Schlegel)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rösler, Herbert, Nguyen, Truong Quang, Doan, Kien Van, Ho, Cuc Thu, Nguyen, Tao Thien, Ziegler, Thomas (2010): A new species of the genus Gekko Laurenti (Squamata: Sauria: Gekkonidae) from Vietnam with remarks on G. japonicus (Schlegel). Zootaxa 2329: 56-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275451
